  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1245</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Webquest about Yom Yerushalayim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Webquest über Yom Yerushalayim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un Webquest au sujet de Yom Yerushalayim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um Webquest sobre Yom Yerushalayim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un Webquest circa Yom Yerushalayim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα Webquest για Yom Yerushalayim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un Webquest sobre Yom Yerushalayim</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Junior high and high school learners take on roles and research the Six Day War. Roles include: historian, philosopher, military commander, reporter and architect</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Yom Yerushalayim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Six Day War</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hohe und High School Junioranfänger nehmen auf 
Rollen und erforschen die sechs, die Tag War. Roles einschließen: 
Historiker, Philosoph, militärischer Kommandant, Reporter und 
Architekt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants juniors de haut et lycée prennent 
des rôles et recherchent les six que le jour War. Roles incluent : 
historien, philosophe, commandant militaire, journaliste et 
architecte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os learners júniors da High School elevada e 
fazem exame em papéis e pesquisam os seis que o dia Guerra Papel 
inclui: historian, filósofo, comandante militar, repórter e 
arquiteto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I principianti minori dell'alta e High School 
intraprendono i ruoli e ricercano i sei che il giorno War. Roles 
include: storico, filosofo, comandante militare, reporter ed 
architetto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο νεώτερος υψηλός και οι αρχάριοι γυμνασίου παίρνουν 
τους ρόλους και ερευνούν τον πόλεμο έξι ημερών. Οι ρόλοι 
περιλαμβάνουν: ιστορικός, φιλόσοφος, στρατιωτικός 
διοικητής, δημοσιογράφος και αρχιτέκτονας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los principiantes menores de la High School alta y
secundaria adquieren papeles e investigan los seises que el día War. 
Roles incluye: historiador, filósofo, comandante militar, 
reportero y arquitecto</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Yom Yerushalayim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sechs Tageskrieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Yom Yerushalayim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
